data.name: Performance #3 - Fill an Int-Array - Need Highest Speed
data.description:
If you liked or hated "Performance #2 - Fill an Int-Array - Need High Speed", this will be more difficult!
Its recommended to do "Performance #2 - Fill an Int-Array - Need High Speed" before you try this kata.

You have to fill an int Array with numbers from 0 to 3999999

The numbers have to be in ascending order.

But there is a problem. You have to do this very very very very quick.

For better time measurement, now there are 500 runs of the test method!
(Also the allowed time will be always calculated on the fly.)

In "Performance #2 - Fill an Int-Array - Need High Speed" you wrote fast code, but now maybe it's not fast enough!
Too fast for you?

Hint: Think about the Description of the test... ;-) The test must be completed quick!
